code: import{createStore}from'redux';import initialState from'./initialState';import shortid from'shortid';export const getAllPosts=_ref=>{let{posts}=_ref;return posts;};export const getPostById=(_ref2,postId)=>{let{posts}=_ref2;return posts.find(post=>post.id===postId);};export const deletePostById=payload=>({type:'DELETE_POST',postId:payload});export const addPost=payload=>({type:'ADD_POST',post:payload});export const editPost=payload=>({type:'EDIT_POST',post:payload});const postsReducer=function(){let statePart=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'DELETE_POST':return[...statePart.filter(post=>post.id!==action.postId)];case'ADD_POST':return[...statePart,{...action.post,id:shortid()}];case'EDIT_POST':return statePart.map(post=>post.id===action.post.id?{...post,...action.post}:post);default:return statePart;}};const reducer=(state,action)=>{const newState={posts:postsReducer(state.posts,action)};return newState;};const store=createStore(reducer,initialState,window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__());export default store;
